title: Brazil forward Neymar has successful knee surgery
summary: Brazil and Santos forward Neymar has a successful operation on his left knee to repair a damaged meniscus.

title: Ready for an Xtina Xmas? Christina Aguileraโs โMagicalโ Holiday Special Is Coming to TV ScreensยTonight
summary: The festive film set in Paris previously premiered in theaters.
body: Christina Aguilera lit up the Eiffel Tower while filming her holiday special, and now, she’s ready to light up your TV screens this Christmas. Related The 30 Best Christmas Songs of the 21st Century (So Far): Staff Picks Mariah Carey Reveals She’s Performing at the 2026 Olympics Opening Ceremony: ‘Ci Vediamo a Milano!’ ‘A Present We Can All Enjoy’: Kelly Clarkson to Headline Netflix’s NFL Christmas Game Day Open The vocalist holiday special titled Christina Aguilera: Christmas in Paris will be on tonight, Dec. 22 following a theatrical premiere earlier in the month. The hour-long program filmed in Paris is premiering at 9 p.m. ET/PT on the CBS Television Network and Paramount+ . It celebrates the 25th anniversary of Aguilera’s My Kind of Christmas album, which reached No. 28 on the Billboard 200 in 2000. A description reads that the special features “magical live performances from the City of Love” — filmed with a live orchestra above the Musรฉe du Quai Branly with Paris’ most famous tower sparkling behind the singer — as well as a “look into Aguileraโs remarkable career.” Thereโฆ

title: Bad Bunnyโs โDTMFโ Matches Enrique Iglesiasโ Hit for Second-Longest Run at No. 1 on Hot LatinยSongs
summary: Benito's track banks its 41st week at the top.
body: Bad Bunny secured his record-extending seventh consecutive win atop Billboard โs year-end top Latin Artist of the year in 2025, and now, he inches closer to another record. His hit โDTMFโ logs its 41st week at No. 1 on the Hot Latin Songs chart (dated Dec. 27), tying for the second-most weeks at No. 1 by Enrique Iglesiasโ โBailando,โ featuring Descemer Bueno and Gente de Zona, which concluded its 41-week streak atop the chart in February 2015. Both songs trail Luis Fonsi and Daddy Yankeeโs โDespacito,โ featuring Justin Bieber, which continues to lead with 56 weeks at No. 1. The Hot Latin Songs chart launched in 1986. โDTMF,โ the fourth single from Benitoโs No. 1 album Debรญ Tirar Mรกs Fotos , banks its 41st week at the summit on Hot Latin Songs fueled by 6.1 official on-demand streams in the United States during the Dec.12-18 tracking week, as reported by Luminate. It marked the second song from the album to achieve the No. 1 slot, following โNuevayolโ (one week in January), which sits at No. 5 with 5.6 million streams. Additionally, two other Debรญ tracks hold strong on the chartโs top 10: โBaile Inolvidableโ at No. 3 and โEOOโ at No. 4. In the 39-year-old history of the Hot Latin Sโฆ

title: Snoop Dogg to Make NBA Game Analyst Debut During Warriors-Clippers Match: โA Dream ComeยTrueโ
summary: Snoop's first time calling some hoops action is set to take place in January.
body: Snoop Dogg is completing another side mission. The rapper will be moving his courtside view a few seats over when he’ll make his NBA game analyst debut for NBCSN and Peacock on Peacock NBA Monday Jan. 5. Related ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ HUNTR/X Singers & Lainey Wilson to Slay Snoop Dogg’s NFL Christmas Halftime Show Merry Snoopmas! Snoop Dogg to Perform at Lions-Vikings NFL Christmas Gameday Live on Netflix Snoop Dogg Becomes Team USA’s First Honorary Coach for 2026 Olympic Winter Games Snoop’s broadcast debut will take place at the Intuit Dome in Los Angeles when the Clippers battle Steph Curry and the Golden State Warriors. The West Coast rap legend is slated to bring his unique flair and hoops knowledge to call the second half of the game alongside Terry Gannon and Reggie Miller. “This is a dream come true for me,” Snoop Dogg said in a statement. “I’m fired up to be joining Reggie Miller and Terry Gannon on the call for the Clippers-Warriors game on Jan. 5. I can’t wait to bring a fresh vibe to the analysis while celebrating the skills and strategy these teams bring every night.” Snoop Dogg iโฆ
